quotes.text: A kiss may ruin a human life

quotes.text: Books are to me as homemade tattoos are to an inmate. Can't get enough of them.
quotes.author: Laurie Notaro

quotes.text: some people fall in love over and over again while some people can only do it once.

quotes.text: She hardly ever thought of him. He had worn a place for himself in some corner of her heart, as a sea shell, always boring against the rock, might do. The making of the place had been her pain. But now the shell was safely in the rock. It was lodged, and ground no longer.

quotes.text: As if you were on fire from within.The moon lives in the lining of your skin.
